title.value: Query form to find documents related to specified product(s)

repeating.value: OpenText Life Sciences Quality and Manufacturing Solution
OpenText Life Sciences Submission Storage and Viewing
OpenText Life Sciences Research and Development Solution

dql_value.value: select object_name, title, r_version_label, a_status, r_modify_date, indication, product_trade_name, product_generic_name, drug_substance_name, inn_names, product_compound_id, product_chemical_names, product_code, product_aliases, referenced_product_codes, derived_product_codes, r_object_id from cd_common_ref_model where r_object_type not like '%_info' and (product_code in ($repeatingvalue(product_codes)) or '$value(product_codes) ' = ' ' or any referenced_product_codes in ($repeatingvalue(product_codes))or any derived_product_codes in ($repeatingvalue(product_codes)) and ('$value(indication) ' = ' ' or any indication in ($repeatingvalue(indication))) and ('$value(product_trade_name) ' = ' ' or any product_trade_name in ($repeatingvalue(product_trade_name))) and ('$value(product_generic_name) ' = ' ' or any product_generic_name in ($repeatingvalue(product_generic_name))) and ('$value(drug_substance_name) ' = ' ' or any drug_substance_name in ($repeatingvalue(drug_substance_name))) and ('$value(inn_names) ' = ' ' or any inn_names in ($repeatingvalue(inn_names))) and ('$value(product_compound_id) ' = ' ' or any product_compound_id in ($repeatingvalue(product_compound_id))) and ('$value(product_chemical_names) ' = ' ' or any product_chemical_names in ($repeatingvalue(product_chemical_names))) and r_object_type not like '%_info') order by r_object_id, product_code
